The placebo contain excipients expect zinc sulfate . Multiple blood draw perform throughout course study , determine responsiveness plasma zinc concentration zinc supplementation . Two baseline blood draw occur prior start supplementation ( study day -7 0 ) . Blood draw perform day 1 , 2 , 5 , 9 , 14 21 21 day supplementation period . Upon termination supplementation ( day 21 ) , blood draw perform day 1 , 2 , 5 , 9 , 14 21 post-supplementation ( study day 22 , 23 , 26 , 30 , 35 42 ) .
